Title: Makes permanent certain provisions of chapter 22 of the laws of 2014, relating to expanding opportunities for service-disabled veteran-owned business enterprises
Summary: Makes permanent certain provisions relating to expanding opportunities for service-disabled veteran-owned business enterprises.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 22 of the laws of 2014, relating to expanding opportunities for service-disabled veteran-owned business enterprises, in relation to making certain provisions thereof permanent
